object.name: project
object.property: <model xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="title" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>Project Title</description> <max_length>80</max_length> <title>Title</title> </field> <field name="url" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>URL where project is deployed.</description> <required>False</required> <title>URL</title> </field> <field name="released" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description>Date when the project was released.</description> <required>False</required> <title>First release</title> </field> <field name="ongoing" type="zope.schema.Bool" form:widget="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form"> <description>Whether or not project is still being developed.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Ongoing</title> </field> <field name="technologies" type="zope.schema.List"> <description /> <required>False</required> <title>Technologies Used</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>Python</element> <element>Zope</element> <element>Plone</element> <element>Paster</element> <element>Buildout</element> <element>PostgreSQL</element> <element>Nginx</element> <element>SSL</element> <element>Supervisord</element> <element>Munin</element> <element>CentOS</element> <element>z3c.recipe.crontab</element> <element>collecive.recipe.backup</element> <element>Plone Placeful Workflow</element> <element>Sphinx</element> <element>niteoweb.click2sell</element> <element>Transmogrifier</element> <element>SMS dispatch module</element> <element>PloneFormGen</element> <element>CacheFu</element> <element>Varnish</element> <element>FCKEditor</element> <element>RichDocument</element> <element>Plone Wilkin Theme</element> <element>vBulletin</element> <element>phpBB</element> <element>PloneTrueGallery</element> <element>Plone Nautica Theme</element> <element>Intense Simplicity</element> <element>qPloneCaptchas</element> <element>Plone Comments</element> <element>LinguaPlone</element> <element>ZopeSkel</element> <element>Windmill</element> <element>Wordpress</element> <element>PHP</element> <element>MySQL</element> <element>SQL</element> <element>DNS</element> <element>hosting</element> <element>networks</element> <element>security</element> <element>password managing</element> <element>iptables</element> <element>plain HTML/CSS</element> <element>XHTML</element> <element>CSS</element> <element>Javascript</element> <element>Apache</element> </values> </value_type> </field> <field name="description" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Short description of the project (one or two scentences).</description> <required>False</required> <title>General Description</title> </field> <field name="body" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText" indexer:searchable="true" xmlns:indexer="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/indexer"> <description /> <required>False</required> <title>Detailed Description</title> </field> </schema> </model>
